execution_plan.description: Retrieve all users from the app database (includes id, username, email). Add placeholders for full_name and a source tag for later merging.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id, username, email, NULL::TEXT AS full_name, 'app' AS source FROM users;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve all users from the app_chat database (includes id, username, full_name). Add a placeholder for email and a source tag for later merging.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id, username, NULL::TEXT AS email, full_name, 'app_chat' AS source FROM users;
